title: Principia Unitas - Volume I - On the Information in Light
description: This book puts forth the proposition that light has three states - information, wave and particle. The book introduces the new field of physics called QID - quantum infodynamics. Explains the reality of the information-wave-particle triplet of light. Introduces the principles on which the Unified Field Theory and Unified Standard Model are based, and is recommended to be read as the introductory book of Principia Unitas.
author: Christina Munns
